press_e: Press ~INPUT_CONTEXT~ to do your boating license for $_price_
no_exams: You have already completed the exam

welcome.title: Welcome to the boating school!
paragraphs: After you have passed your test, you will have permission to drive water vehicles.

failed.title: You have not passed the exam!
paragraphs: You can try the exam again.

passed.title: You have passed the exam!
paragraphs: You are now permitted to drive water vehicles.
